title: Riot Support....
body: Honestly, never had a company whose support team was so great. Pretty fast response time, actual humans respond to you, and just all around amazing people. Never had a problem yall couldnt fix, stay wonderful :)

replies.body: Plz riot i want to change my account from eu west to eu nordic plZ
I never got a human response i jusst get templates LOL

Mad love coming back your way, fam. <3

http://orig12.deviantart.net/3417/f/2012/147/1/9/tf2___bro_fist____sniper_and_scout___free_gif__by_sniperisawesome-d51b7dr.gif
